09-26-2024: - Bots can now choose to play {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lady Geist|Size=20}} Lady Geist, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Mirage|Size=20}} Mirage, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Shiv|Size=20}} Shiv, and {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20}} Binding Word escape range and escape time increased by 15%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Last Stand|Size=20}} Last Stand spirit scaling increased from 0.9 to 1.2
09-12-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask debuff duration reduced from 7s to 6s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask radius reduced from 7m to 6.5m
- You gain 50% bullet resistance during the 2s ult channel
08-29-2024: - Base movement speed reduced from 6.5 to 6
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate scaling with spirit reduced from 0.375 {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate per Spirit to 0.3
08-15-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20}} Binding Word no longer drains 1 stamina
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask cooldown reduced from 16s to 13s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask T2 changed from -10s Cooldown to Drains 1 Stamina
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask T3 now also reduces cooldown by -7s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20}} Binding Word immobilize duration reduced from 2s to 1.75
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20}} Binding Word now has a quick cast behavior (same as {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20}} Static Charge)
08-01-2024: - Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask impact sounds
- Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20}} Binding Word sound mix for teammates
07-18-2024: - Added {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask cast, projectile, and impact sound effects

- Reverted a change from last update to {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask – it now launches where the reticle is aiming at the end of the cast
07-11-2024: - Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: {{HeroIcon|Hero=Ivy|Size=20}} Ivy's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kudzu Bomb|Size=20}} Kudzu Bomb, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Paradox|Size=20}} Paradox's {{AbilityIcon|Ability={{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake, {{ItemIcon|Item=Alchemical Fire|Size=20}} Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
- Reload time no longer scales with spirit power
- Now innately gains additive fire rate from spirit power (scale factor is 0.015)
06-27-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Willpower|Size=20}} Willpower no longer loses movement speed when the shield is depleted
06-20-2024: - Updated reload animations for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Dynamo|Size=20}} Dynamo, and {{HeroIcon|Hero=Ivy|Size=20}} Ivy
06-06-2024: - Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Binding Word|Size=20}} Binding Word delay and impact sounds
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask T3 increased from +25% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate Slow to +35%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Willpower|Size=20}} Willpower T3 increased from +150 Spirit Shield to +200
05-30-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Last Stand|Size=20}} Last Stand duration increased from 5s to 6s
05-23-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask travel speed increased from 800 to 1000
05-16-2024: - {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Last Stand|Size=20}} Last Stand has improved visual effects
- New voice for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden (in advance of upcoming model swap)
- Fixed a bug where {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden's second and third abilities were swapped VO wise
